title: I Appear to have been Reincarnated as a Love Interest in an Otome Game - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Butlers   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Early Romance   Engagement   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Otome Game   R-15   Reincarnated in a Game World
author: Minami   みなみ
description:
I was reincarnated into a horrifying world. That is… the world of the otome game “I’ll Risk Everything for You”.

In that world I was reincarnated as the hidden love interest character, and decided to never involve myself with the Heroine. My head gets all screwed up whenever I’m around them.

This is a love story of the main character who reincarnated into a love interest and the young woman who served as the villain.>
